languages.text: "Я хотела завязать только с одним прошлым — и я это уже сделала! И вообще, законник, варп тебя дери — сам сказал: надежда слепит. Так что не раскатывай тут губу, строя на меня планы!"

"There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"
languages.original_text: "Я хотела завязать только с одним прошлым — и я это уже сделала! И вообще, законник, варп тебя дери — сам сказал: надежда слепит. Так что не раскатывай тут губу, строя на меня планы!"

traits.locale_text: "I only wanted to cut loose of one past, and I've already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

"I only wanted to cut loose of one past, and I've already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

"There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

"There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

languages.text: “我唯一想摆脱的过去，早就已经摆脱掉了，多谢关心！还有，去他妈的，法务官。你自己刚刚也说希望使人盲目，所以，你还是少做点白日梦，别再盘算我的未来了！”
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: “我唯一想摆脱的过去，早就已经摆脱掉了，多谢关心！还有，去他妈的，法务官。你自己刚刚也说希望使人盲目，所以，你还是少做点白日梦，别再盘算我的未来了！”

languages.text: «Solo ha habido un pasado que quisiera dejar atrás, ¡y ya lo hice! Además, ya lo ha dicho usted mismo: la esperanza nos ciega. ¡Así que deje de hacerse ilusiones y planes con respecto a mi futuro!».
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: «Solo ha habido un pasado que quisiera dejar atrás, ¡y ya lo hice! Además, ya lo ha dicho usted mismo: la esperanza nos ciega. ¡Así que deje de hacerse ilusiones y planes con respecto a mi futuro!».

languages.text: « Il n'y avait qu'un seul passé que je voulais laisser derrière moi, et c'est déjà fait, merci bien ! Et aussi, comme vous l'avez si bien dit, homme de loi : l'espoir peut aveugler. Alors, arrêtez de fantasmer sur mon futur ! »
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y avait qu'un seul passé que je voulais laisser derrière moi, et c'est déjà fait, merci bien ! Et aussi, comme vous l'avez si bien dit, homme de loi : l'espoir peut aveugler. Alors, arrêtez de fantasmer sur mon futur ! »

languages.text: 「アタシが断ち切りたかった過去はただ一つで、もうとっくに断ち切ったよ、ありがと！それに…〈歪み〉のくそったれめ。法執行官、アンタ自身が言ったでしょ？希望は人の目を曇らせるって。だから、アタシの未来の夢見たり計画すんのはもうやめてよ！」
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: 「アタシが断ち切りたかった過去はただ一つで、もうとっくに断ち切ったよ、ありがと！それに…〈歪み〉のくそったれめ。法執行官、アンタ自身が言ったでしょ？希望は人の目を曇らせるって。だから、アタシの未来の夢見たり計画すんのはもうやめてよ！」

languages.text: "Kurtulmak istediğim tek bir geçmiş vardı, onu zaten unuttum. Sağ olasın! Ayrıca öteboyut lanetleyesice kanuncu, kendi ağzınla söyledin... Umut kör eder. Bu yüzden hayal kurmayı ve geleceğim hakkında plan yapmayı bırak!"
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: "Kurtulmak istediğim tek bir geçmiş vardı, onu zaten unuttum. Sağ olasın! Ayrıca öteboyut lanetleyesice kanuncu, kendi ağzınla söyledin, umut kör eder. Bu yüzden hayal kurmayı ve geleceğim hakkında plan yapmayı bırak!"

languages.text: "Es gibt nur eine Vergangenheit, von der ich mich lösen wollte, und das habe ich bereits erledigt, danke! Und außerdem ... der Warp sei verdammt, Gesetzeshüter, Ihr habt es selbst gesagt: Hoffnung macht blind. Also vergesst die Tagträume mit Euren Plänen für meine Zukunft!"
languages.original_text: "There's only one past I wanted to break from, and I have already done so, thank you! And also — warp damn it, lawman, you've said it yourself: hope blinds. So drop it with the daydreaming and making plans about my future!"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt nur eine Vergangenheit, von der ich mich lösen wollte, und das habe ich bereits erledigt, danke! Und außerdem ... der Warp sei verdammt, Gesetzeshüter, Ihr habt es selbst gesagt: Hoffnung macht blind. Also vergesst die Tagträume mit Euren Plänen für meine Zukunft!"
